title: John Bercow starts to profit from his time as Speaker - just weeks after saying he would not 'milk' it
text:
John Bercow has started making thousands of pounds from speeches about his role in Parliament just weeks after insisting that he would not "milk" his position as Speaker.

Leading former Tory ministers Amber Rudd and Sir Oliver Letwin who thwarted Boris Johnson's plans to take the UK out of the European Union next week are also raking in thousands of pounds on the speaking circuit.

Mr Bercow disclosed in a Parliamentary filing that he has started accepting thousands to “discuss my role as Speaker and the work of Parliament.”

In the past month he received more than £5,000 to speak to audiences in Zurich, Amsterdam, New York and Boston.

Mr Bercow brings a curtain on a controversial decade as Speaker...
description: John Bercow has started making thousands of pounds from speeches about his role in Parliament just weeks after insisting that he would not "milk" his position as Speaker.
